snippet.title: Hive Quest PROMO Movie
snippet.description:
Hive Quest is an indie 3rd person adventure & strategy game set in a lush, enchanted woodland filled with ancient magic, strange creatures and beautiful hand crafted scenery.

Solve challenging puzzles and explore the tangled undergrowth in search of hidden secrets.

Make friends and enemies alike as you wage war and manage the fortunes of your tribe.

Awaken the spirit of a forgotten woodland creature to be your pet, then train them to help you on your tribal quest to find fortune, glory and a new home

Wishlist the game on Steam - https://bit.ly/2xAuLpf
Download the latest demo version! - ( PC Only) - https://www.indiedb.com/members/goldenheartgames/downloads
